snippet: Former New York State Senate majority leader Joseph L. Bruno may be tried for mail fraud, despite his claims that doing so would be double jeopardy.
abstract: Federal appeals court rules that that former New York State Senate majority leader Joseph L Bruno may be tried on two counts of mail fraud despite his claims that it would constitute double jeopardy.
lead_paragraph: Former New York State Senate majority leader Joseph L. Bruno may be tried for mail fraud, despite his claims that doing so would be double jeopardy.

headline.main: Court Rules Bruno May Face Fraud Charges
headline.print_headline: Court Rules Bruno May Face Fraud Charges
